Intro.Body:
When you were young, they told you both your parents were gone. But your grandfather kept a secret: your father died, yes, but your mother was not human. She was something else. Elven. Today, he gives you a weathered journal, the first key in a legacy buried deep in forest and memory.

You stand at the edge of the woods where your mother once vanished. Something ancient stirs in the trees. You feel it calling...

Reverie Entrance.Body: You stand at the Reverie Entrance, the forest thick with secrets and longing. Your grandfather’s tale echoes in your mind.

Virala Pond.Body: Calm water reflects a broken sky. Dragonflies flit over lily pads. A narrow trail leads deeper.

Choices.Text: Follow the trail to Thimoraya Crossing

Thimoraya Crossing.Body: Three ancient stones glow faintly beneath moss. Choose two to activate a path: Yellow, Red, or Blue.

Kwethya Cascade.Body: The waterfall thunders nearby. Behind it, a cave hides a glowing crystal. As you remove it, the cave begins to tremble.

Lisahali Falls.Body: Misty spray kisses your skin. The green path leads only here, a peaceful dead-end with no hidden secrets.

Aurelem Veil.Body: The right-most path ends in shimmering air. You sense a presence, watching. A hidden trail leads further.

Choices.Text: Take the trail to Filiesa Hollow

Filiesa Hollow.Body: Soft moss underfoot, glowing spores in the air. From here, a vine-covered gate waits in the shadows.

Nethmil Gate.Body: You approach the gate, its presence unwavering in the stillness, standing tall and resolute.

Everile’s Heart.Body: A golden oasis of bioluminescent flora opens before you. Elves and fairies greet you with radiant joy. You are Home.
